synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involved weighing and mixing lithium sulfide, diphosphorus pentasulfide, and lithium chloride powders, ball milling the mixture, heating it in a tubular electric furnace with hydrogen sulfide gas flow, further heating at 500Â°C, crushing and sieving the sample, all conducted in a controlled environment, leading to the synthesis of a compound with a cubic argyrodite-type crystal structure of Li5.0PS4.4Cl1.2.
